Article.Title: New Pokemon Chart (Beta) In The Charts Section!
Article.Text:
Interested in seeing what Pokemon there are? How about ones that aren't released in Pokemon GO yet?
Check this out!

Article.Title: Aggron Is Now A Raid Boss!
Article.Text:
With the release of 23 more Pokemon from the Hoenn Region, another was added as a Raid Boss.
Check out what you can get!

Article.Title: Another New GAME_MASTER!!
Article.Text:
Another new GAME_MASTER file was released on 23 January 2018, just in time for the Release of 23 more Gen3 Pokemon!
I have updated the site to show which Pokemon are now available.

Article.Title: Move Sets Chart Enhancement
Article.Text:
I decided to enhance the Move Sets charts to add filtering capabilites.
Check it out!
